snippet.title: Shadow Blade: Reload Trailer
snippet.description:
Shadow Blade: Reload is the upcoming action platformer from Dead Mage. Coming to PS4/Vita, Xbox One, WiiU, Steam (Win/Mac/Linux)
http://shadowblade.ninja
